name: Water (Kirill Mikhel)
description:
What is it

An exploration puzzle adventure where you are playing as an explorer lost in the desert. Desperate for the water you encounter a chest buried in the sand and something mysterious start to happen…

Recommendations
  • Play with sound turned on
  • Set lower resolution for better performance
How to play

Start with arrow keys and follow the hints.
